projects.name: No Isolation
actions: Industry: EdTech / Learning Platforms
Location: Norway
Duration: 1 year
Role: Technical Lead
Led the architectural revamp of a complex microservices-based learning platform.
The existing system suffered from an overly granular microservices structure, creating high maintenance and operational overhead.
I redesigned the architecture using Bounded Context principles to consolidate and streamline services, improving maintainability, scalability, and system stability.

Additionally, coming from a PHP/Symfony background, I rapidly upskilled in Go (Golang) to meet project needs. Within a short period, I fully adapted to Go and successfully led backend development using it—demonstrating strong technical flexibility and the ability to master new technologies quickly.

projects.name: Carcare
actions: Industry: Automotive / Dealership Management Systems
Location: Sweden
Duration: 2.5 years
Role: Technical Lead
Technical Lead for Carcare, a leading dealership management system (DMS) provider operating across Sweden, Finland, and Norway.
The platform helps automotive dealerships reduce vehicle lead time—from procurement to sale.
Led the architectural revamp of a complex microservices-based automotive dealership management system.
I oversaw development across key product modules, including Used Vehicles, New Vehicles, Purchase Analysis, and Market Insights, driving improvements in reliability, scalability, and user experience.
